projects.title: Auxly Cannabis Group
projects.description: Auxly is a top 5 Canadian licensed producer of cannabis made up cannabis enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and researchers with a belief in quality innovation and building authentic connections with consumers. The objective of their website was to give an overview of their inhouse brands, while providing their investor relations team a platform to easily update the latest PR documents and accouncements.

projects.title: Dosecann
projects.description: Dosecann Cannabis Solutions is a Canadian cannabis company that specializes in the development and manufacturing of innovative cannabis products. They offer a wide range of cannabis-infused products including oils, capsules, and sprays. Dosecann is a calm wellness focused brand - it was important the website reflect these feelings, along with providing information in French for their Quebec customers.
